  • Diferenças de Design: Compreensão clara entre System Design e System Architecture, e entre arquiteturas stateful e stateless.


Será um diferencial se você tiver:

  • Inteligência Artificial: Familiaridade com ferramentas de IA, como ChatGPT e GitHub Copilot, para apoiar a produtividade e inovação no desenvolvimento.
  • Conhecimentos em Acoplamento: Habilidade para projetar sistemas com baixo acoplamento (loose coupling), visando flexibilidade e resiliência.


Contratação: CLT com benefícios

▶ Código do Projeto: 119

✅ Para ter sucesso em processos seletivos:

title: Staff Software Engineer Backend
description:
Nosso cliente é uma empresa nacional de tecnologia, com forte atuação no segmento médico e hospitalar, situada na região da Vila Olímpia, São Paulo, capital.


Estamos em busca de uma pessoa com mentalidade Full Cycle, que incorpore segurança desde o início (securityby-design) e garanta qualidade e confiabilidade ao longo de todo o ciclo de vida da aplicação.


Buscamos alguém que valorize a colaboração com áreas como produto, design e engenharia, alinhando de forma estratégica as prioridades de negócio com soluções técnicas.

Procuramos uma pessoa que trabalhe bem em equipe, comunicando-se com clareza e precisão, mesmo em contextos com múltiplos stakeholders e objetivos complexos.


É importante ter experiência com metodologias ágeis e capacidade de adaptação a mudanças e cenários ambíguos.


Requisitos iniciais:

Ter pelo menos 5 anos como Software Engineer Sênior;


Responsabilidades e atribuições:

  • Liderar o design e a implementação de soluções de software escaláveis, robustas e seguras.
  • Definir e evoluir a arquitetura da plataforma, considerando aspectos como desempenho, disponibilidade, segurança e manutenibilidade.
  • Conduzir a tomada de decisões técnicas, avaliando diferentes abordagens e tecnologias.
  • Mentorar e orientar outros(as) engenheiros(as), promovendo o crescimento técnico da equipe.
  • Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares (Produto, Design, etc.) para alinhar as prioridades de negócio com as soluções técnicas.
  • Garantir a qualidade do código e a entrega de software de alta qualidade.
  • Contribuir para a definição e implementação de estratégias de testes e deploy.
  • Avaliar e implementar novas tecnologias e ferramentas para melhorar a eficiência e a eficácia do desenvolvimento.


Você tem sólida experiência com:

  • Cloud Computing: Domínio em AWS, especialmente em ambientes que utilizam Kubernetes e API Gateway, garantindo a segurança, escalabilidade e performance dos serviços.
  • Desenvolvimento Back-End: Proficiência em PHP, Node.js e principalmente em Go com capacidade para desenvolver e manter APIs e sistemas robustos e escaláveis.
  • Bancos de Dados: Experiência em MySQL e PostgreSQL, com compreensão de modelagem, otimização e manutenção de bases de dados complexas.
  • Containers e Virtualização: Familiaridade com Docker, com capacidade para desenvolver ambientes de testes, desenvolvimento e produção isolados e consistentes.
  • Arquitetura de Eventos: Conhecimento de arquitetura baseada em eventos, incluindo SQS, Kafka e compreensão de sincronização (sync vs async) e consistência de dados (strong vs eventual consistency).
  • RTO/RPO: Profundo entendimento dos conceitos de Recovery Time Objective (RTO) e Recovery Point Objective (RPO) para a definição de estratégias de recuperação e continuidade.
  • Conhecimentos em segurança da informação, incluindo autenticação e autorização (OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, JWT, RBAC, ABAC e PBAC), noções de criptografia, rate limiting e throttling.


Práticas e conhecimentos avançados em:

  • SOLID e Clean Code: Aplicação constante dos princípios de desenvolvimento de software, garantindo legibilidade, manutenibilidade e escalabilidade do código.
  • Design Patterns: Sólida compreensão de padrões de design e quando aplicá-los no desenvolvimento de soluções robustas.
  • Documentação Técnica: Habilidade para criar diagramas (de sequência, classe e componentes) que documentem as arquiteturas e fluxos dos sistemas.
  • Caching e Otimização: Implementação de estratégias de caching para otimização de performance e redução de carga em bancos de dados.
  • Versionamento de Código e APIs: Experiência em GitFlow, versionamento semântico de aplicações e APIs, e práticas de commits semânticos. Além disso, conhecimento profundo sobre versionamento de APIs, quando e como versionar para garantir estabilidade e compatibilidade.
  • REST e Códigos HTTP: Sólido conhecimento em APIs RESTful, incluindo padrões REST, verbos e códigos HTTP, garantindo comunicação eficiente e segura entre serviços.
  • Boas Práticas de Log: Conhecimento em práticas de logging, incluindo níveis de log (info, debug, warn, error, etc.) e implementação de logs de auditoria para rastreabilidade e conformidade.


Conhecimento em arquitetura e escalabilidade:

  • Arquitetura de Sistemas: Experiência com diferentes arquiteturas, incluindo monólitos, monólitos modulares e micro serviços, além de conceitos de serverless.
  • Escalabilidade e Alta Disponibilidade: Noções de escalabilidade vertical e horizontal, alta disponibilidade (High Availability) e tolerância a falhas (Fault Tolerance). SLA, SLO, SLI: Conhecimento das métricas de qualidade e confiabilidade para o cumprimento de níveis de serviço.
  • Diferenças de Design: Compreensão clara entre System Design e System Architecture, e entre arquiteturas stateful e stateless.


Será um diferencial se você tiver:

  • Inteligência Artificial: Familiaridade com ferramentas de IA, como ChatGPT e GitHub Copilot, para apoiar a produtividade e inovação no desenvolvimento.
  • Conhecimentos em Acoplamento: Habilidade para projetar sistemas com baixo acoplamento (loose coupling), visando flexibilidade e resiliência.


Contratação: CLT com benefícios

▶ Código do Projeto: 119

title: Business Development Expert
description:
Business Development Expert – AI & Automation Services


About the Role:

We are looking for a proactive, self-driven, and tech-savvy Business Development Expert to help us penetrate new markets and grow our client base in the field of AI-powered operational process automation .


This is a full-time, mid-to-senior level role designed for someone who thrives in the full sales cycle — from identifying ideal prospects to turning them into long-term clients. You’ll take the lead on prospecting, outbound outreach, discovery calls, and client onboarding , and you’ll stay involved to help nurture relationships and unlock further growth opportunities.


If you're passionate about AI, energized by creating value through automation, and skilled at building business relationships from scratch, we’d love to meet you.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Prospect Generation : Research industries, identify key targets, and build well-qualified lead lists using AI tools and databases.
  • Cold Outreach : Initiate contact with potential clients via email, LinkedIn, phone, and other platforms to spark interest and generate meetings.
  • Discovery & Solution Mapping : Conduct consultative discovery calls, uncover client needs, and clearly articulate the value of our automation services.
  • Sales Strategy Execution : Use modern sales methods and AI-powered tools to test, adapt, and improve outreach strategies.
  • Client Conversion & Onboarding : Follow through the full cycle — from first contact to closing — ensuring a seamless handoff to the delivery team.
  • Relationship Growth : Maintain strong client relationships and explore additional opportunities for business growth.
  • CRM & Reporting : Keep accurate records of all activities, manage your pipeline, and track performance metrics.


Main Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of experience in B2B sales, business development, or client acquisition.
  • Experience selling consulting services , AI/automation solutions , SaaS , or platform-based services .
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English .
  • Strong outbound sales experience — comfortable with cold emails, calls, and LinkedIn outreach.
  • Tech-savvy and passionate about using AI tools in your workflow; constantly exploring new tools and sales strategies.
  • Analytical, organized, and persistent, with a growth mindset and a self-starter attitude.
  • Curious and research-driven — love solving problems and creating meaningful conversations.


What We Offer:

  • A competitive base salary with performance-based commissions.
  • A fully remote and engaging work environment.
  • Access to cutting-edge AI tools and resources to support your growth.
  • The chance to make a direct impact in a company that values innovation, autonomy, and learning.


How to Apply:

Please send your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're excited about this opportunity.

title: Ux Designer Pleno
description:
Somos uma empresa do Grupo Stefanini. Especializados em marketing digital, utilizamos uma abordagem integrada que combina tecnologia, inteligência de dados, design e profundo conhecimento do comportamento do consumidor. Nosso foco está em potencializar os resultados de nossos parceiros, oferecendo soluções que vão desde consultoria estratégica até a execução e acompanhamento dos projetos. Com um time dedicado e altamente qualificado, a Gauge se destaca por sua capacidade de entender as necessidades específicas de cada cliente e entregar resultados de alta performance.

Com forte presença na América Latina e em expansão nos Estados Unidos, estamos sempre na vanguarda, aplicando as últimas tendências de mercado e mantendo um olhar atento à inovação contínua.


Atividades aqui no time:

- Criar e evoluir wireframes, protótipos e fluxogramas;

- Realizar estudos de mercado e análises de dados secundários (desk research, benchmarking);

- Analisar os dados coletados e criar apresentações que facilitem a visualização e compreensão dos resultados obtidos;

- Criar experiência intuitivas e fáceis unindo as necessidades do usuário com as necessidades do negócio;

- Documentar e organizar todo o material gerado;

- Criar roteiros e planos de pesquisa;

- Criar e moderar sessões de co-criação com stakeholders e equipes em que estiver alocado;

- Participar dos ritos do time de design e das equipes em que estiver alocado;

- Garantir qualidade de toda a experiência desenvolvida


Requisitos:

- Conhecimentos avançados de Arquitetura de Informação, Usabilidade e Visual Design;

- Experiência com Design System;

- Conhecimentos em ferramentas de prototipação como Figma, Whiteboards e Maze;

- Ter experiência na criação de plano de pesquisa e roteiros para a aplicação de testes de usabilidade;

- Conhecer as ferramentas e técnicas de Design Thinking, Design Sprint e Lean Inception;


Diferenciais:

- Experiência com aplicação de metodologia Ágil e Lean UX;

- Experiência de condução de múltiplos projetos;

- Analisar métricas de produto, implantar indicadores e gerar insights

- Espanhol nível básico ou intermediário

- Criar e evoluir wireframes, protótipos e fluxogramas;

- Realizar estudos de mercado e análises de dados secundários (desk research, benchmarking);

- Analisar os dados coletados e criar apresentações que facilitem a visualização e compreensão dos resultados obtidos;

- Criar experiência intuitivas e fáceis unindo as necessidades do usuário com as necessidades do negócio;

- Documentar e organizar todo o material gerado;

- Criar roteiros e planos de pesquisa;

- Criar e moderar sessões de co-criação com stakeholders e equipes em que estiver alocado;

- Participar dos ritos do time de design e das equipes em que estiver alocado;

- Garantir qualidade de toda a experiência desenvolvida


Requisitos:

- Conhecimentos avançados de Arquitetura de Informação, Usabilidade e Visual Design;

- Experiência com Design System;

- Conhecimentos em ferramentas de prototipação como Figma, Whiteboards e Maze;

- Ter experiência na criação de plano de pesquisa e roteiros para a aplicação de testes de usabilidade;

- Conhecer as ferramentas e técnicas de Design Thinking, Design Sprint e Lean Inception;


Diferenciais:

- Experiência com aplicação de metodologia Ágil e Lean UX;

- Experiência de condução de múltiplos projetos;

- Analisar métricas de produto, implantar indicadores e gerar insights

- Espanhol nível básico ou intermediário

title: Ux Designer Pleno

Especializados em marketing digital, utilizamos uma abordagem integrada que combina tecnologia, inteligência de dados, design e profundo conhecimento do comportamento do consumidor. Nosso foco está em potencializar os resultados de nossos parceiros, oferecendo soluções que vão desde consultoria estratégica até a execução e acompanhamento dos projetos. Com um time dedicado e altamente qualificado, a Gauge se destaca por sua capacidade de entender as necessidades específicas de cada cliente e entregar resultados de alta performance.

title: Desenvolvedor Java
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.



Responsabilidades:

- Desenvolver e manter aplicações backend utilizando Java 9+ e Spring Framework (Boot, Data, etc.);

- Projetar e implementar soluções escaláveis e resilientes com foco em processamento distribuído;

- Integrar e manipular grandes volumes de dados utilizando bancos de dados não-relacionais, especialmente Cassandra e Elasticsearch;

- Garantir a qualidade, performance e segurança das aplicações;

- Colaborar com times multidisciplinares em um ambiente ágil.



Requisitos:

- Experiência comprovada com Java 9 ou superior;

- Domínio de Spring Framework (Boot, Data, Security, etc.);

- Experiência com banco de dados (relacional ou não-relacional)

- Experiência com sistemas distribuídos e/ou arquiteturas orientadas a serviços (ex: microsserviços);

- Familiaridade com boas práticas de versionamento de código (Git), testes automatizados e CI/CD.



Diferenciais:

- Vivência com mensageria (RabbitMQ);

- Experiência com Linux;

- Conhecimento em observabilidade (monitoramento, logs e tracing).



Benefícios:

Vale-refeição/

title: C Embedded Software Engineer (Remote Brazil)
description:
Project Description:

If you're interested in working with extraordinary people and real professionals in one of the largest IT Service Companies, join Luxoft (16,000+ employees around the world), We are looking for a candidate for one of our clients. At this project, we mix creativity, analytics, and a casual (albeit driven) environment in order to get new products and services to market quickly. In Luxoft, our culture is one that strives on solving difficult problems focusing on product engineering based on hypothesis testing to empower people to come up with ideas. We are recognized as Best Place to Code, and we do it with a truly flexible environment, high-impact projects in agile environments, a culture focused on results, training and strong support to grow your career.


Work together with an Automotive Original Equipment Manufacturer of the industrial and agricultural industry to support in the product development & optimization of automated and autonomous control application software using C, in an embedded environment (Linux based), following Scrum methodology.


Responsibilities:

Role is expected to actively support and share technical guidance to the team, coaching in technical topics, provide right direction, result oriented and responsible to deliver the tasks as per the customer expectation as a team, while engaging directly in technical discussions with stakeholders and customers.


•Responsible for software development activities, using corporate guidelines and techniques to ensure performance to specifications

•Ensure a high-quality design supported by testing and verification methods.

•Responsible of creation and maintenance of documentation

•Proactively discussing technically with the customer and project stakeholders about approach, activities, risks and issues

•Development of the software design which covers the related software requirements and respects the defined software architecture.

•Perform peer reviews to improve implementation quality.

• Early validation of Feature proposal and re-design as needed


Mandatory Skills Description:

7+ years of experience working in automotive or similar industry over embedded software development

Advanced Experience in Embedded Linux Controller Application development with Embedded C (go-to-person)

Intermediate to Advance experience working under ROS2 systems (Linux Jazzy/humble)

Basic to Intermediate Experience with Communication Protocols (J1939,CAN, CAN2B, CANFD)

Knowledge/ basic experience with MQTT, ETH

Experience with Configuration and Change Management tools (e.g. Git, GitHub)

Ability to translate and breakdown system requirements into features.

Solid experience in embedded system architectures, Microcontrollers, Embedded C/C++, compilers, and developer environment

Advance Software Development Process Knowledge and experience

Experience with agile methodologies (SAFe)

Experience in customer facing communication, Team player with solid communication skills

Strong problem-solving skills, ability to solve technical problems independently and support others when needed

Intercultural orientation

Embrace and adapt to changes

Proactive and collaborative attitude

Result oriented, customer centric

C1 English level

Ability to Travel to US


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Knowledge/ basic experience with other programming languages (Python/C++) is highly desired

Experience with Behavioral tree design is highly desired

Experience with Gazebo

Knowledge in safety related processes (ISO26262)

Knowledge in security related processes (ISO21434)

Requirements engineering.

Strong knowledge about Quality assurance, Software release procedures and capability models (e.g. ASPICE, CMMI)

Experience Working with diagnostics (UDS ISO 14229, SAEJ1939)


Languages:

English: C1 Advanced

title: University Professor in Aerospace Engineering (hybrid in Madrid)
description:
Are you a PhD holder (or in the final stages) in Aerospace or Aeronautical Engineering with a passion for teaching? Join one of Europe’s most prestigious and innovative universities, based in the vibrant city of Madrid.


Responsibilities

  • Teach undergraduate and master’s level courses related to aircraft systems within the aerospace engineering curriculum.
  • Engage in research and/or outreach activities based on your interests.
  • Collaborate on strategic projects and partnerships within the Flight Systems area.
  • Support academic coordination and administrative duties.

title: Customer Service Specialist
description:
Customer Experience Specialist

  • Location: Remote 
  • Employment Type: Part-time | Monday to Thursday 
  • Work Hours 11:00 PM – 4:00 AM BRT (12:00 PM – 5:00 PM AEST)


About us:

Founded in 2017, we’re a world leading crypto wealth platform, helping the 99% access digital assets once reserved for the elite. Our secure, user-friendly technology empowers everyday investors to diversify with ease.


Our passionate and experienced team believes in the power of blockchain technology and asset tokenization to revolutionise how people build wealth. We’re redefining the future of investing—democratising access and creating a more inclusive financial landscape.


About the role:

We’re looking for a proactive and customer-focused Customer Experience Specialist based in Brazil to join our team. You’ll be the first point of contact for customers, supporting them across their entire journey—from onboarding to issue resolution—ensuring a seamless and positive experience.


You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams and operate during 11:00 PM – 4:00 AM BRT ( Aligned with 12:00 PM – 5:00 PM AEST , the company’s core business hours), Monday to Thursday in Brazil. Initial training may take place during Brazilian business hours to support onboarding.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide timely support and guidance, addressing both client and internal inquiries with professionalism and accuracy.
  • Troubleshoot and escalate issues as needed, ensuring resolution and follow-up.
  • Conduct onboarding and verification processes (KYC/KYB), ensuring compliance with internal policies and regulations.
  • Enforce client compliance with security and regulatory standards.
  • Keep customer documentation and knowledge base content accurate and up to date.
  • Share customer insights and feedback with internal teams to support continuous improvement.
  • Test and provide feedback on new product features.
  • Generate reports to support data-driven decision-making.
  • Collaborate closely with Product, Compliance, Operations, Marketing, and Sales teams.
  • Maintain detailed records in line with company guidelines.
  • Assist with data management across internal and external platforms.
  • Support HubSpot administration and other online platforms such as Zoom and Eventbrite.
  • Participate in team meetings and contribute ideas for ongoing process improvements.


Requirements:

  • Fluent in English (both written and spoken) with strong communication skills.
  • Experience in Customer Support, Customer experience, or a similar client-facing role.
  • Experience with help desk and remote support tools.
  • Understanding of CRM systems; HubSpot knowledge is a major plus.
  • Comfortable working with technology and able to quickly learn new tools and platforms.
  • Based in Brazil and available to work during the required AEST hours.
  • Strong multitasking, time management, and problem-solving skills.
  • Patience, empathy, and professionalism when handling complex cases.
  • Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, evolving remote environment.
  • Familiarity with crypto or blockchain is a plus.


What We Offer:

  • Remote-first work environment
  • Inclusive, collaborative team culture
  • 1 accrued PTO day per month worked
  • Independent contractor agreement


Ready to join us?

We’d love to hear from you—please submit your CV in English only for consideration.

  • Experience in Customer Support, Customer experience, or a similar client-facing role.
  • Experience with help desk and remote support tools.
  • Understanding of CRM systems; HubSpot knowledge is a major plus.
  • Comfortable working with technology and able to quickly learn new tools and platforms.
  • Based in Brazil and available to work during the required AEST hours.
  • Strong multitasking, time management, and problem-solving skills.
  • Patience, empathy, and professionalism when handling complex cases.
  • Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, evolving remote environment.
  • Familiarity with crypto or blockchain is a plus.


What We Offer:

  • Remote-first work environment
  • Inclusive, collaborative team culture
  • 1 accrued PTO day per month worked
  • Independent contractor agreement


Ready to join us?

We’d love to hear from you—please submit your CV in English only for consideration.

title: Customer Service Specialist
description:
Customer Experience Specialist

  • Location: Remote 
  • Employment Type: Part-time | Monday to Thursday 
  • Work Hours 11:00 PM – 4:00 AM BRT (12:00 PM – 5:00 PM AEST)


About us:

Founded in 2017, we’re a world leading crypto wealth platform, helping the 99% access digital assets once reserved for the elite. Our secure, user-friendly technology empowers everyday investors to diversify with ease.


Our passionate and experienced team believes in the power of blockchain technology and asset tokenization to revolutionise how people build wealth. We’re redefining the future of investing—democratising access and creating a more inclusive financial landscape.


About the role:

We’re looking for a proactive and customer-focused Customer Experience Specialist based in Brazil to join our team. You’ll be the first point of contact for customers, supporting them across their entire journey—from onboarding to issue resolution—ensuring a seamless and positive experience.


You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams and operate during 11:00 PM – 4:00 AM BRT ( Aligned with 12:00 PM – 5:00 PM AEST , the company’s core business hours), Monday to Thursday in Brazil. Initial training may take place during Brazilian business hours to support onboarding.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide timely support and guidance, addressing both client and internal inquiries with professionalism and accuracy.
  • Troubleshoot and escalate issues as needed, ensuring resolution and follow-up.
  • Conduct onboarding and verification processes (KYC/KYB), ensuring compliance with internal policies and regulations.
  • Enforce client compliance with security and regulatory standards.
  • Keep customer documentation and knowledge base content accurate and up to date.
  • Share customer insights and feedback with internal teams to support continuous improvement.
  • Test and provide feedback on new product features.
  • Generate reports to support data-driven decision-making.
  • Collaborate closely with Product, Compliance, Operations, Marketing, and Sales teams.
  • Maintain detailed records in line with company guidelines.
  • Assist with data management across internal and external platforms.
  • Support HubSpot administration and other online platforms such as Zoom and Eventbrite.
  • Participate in team meetings and contribute ideas for ongoing process improvements.


Requirements:

  • Fluent in English (both written and spoken) with strong communication skills.
  • Experience in Customer Support, Customer experience, or a similar client-facing role.
  • Experience with help desk and remote support tools.
  • Understanding of CRM systems; HubSpot knowledge is a major plus.
  • Comfortable working with technology and able to quickly learn new tools and platforms.
  • Based in Brazil and available to work during the required AEST hours.
  • Strong multitasking, time management, and problem-solving skills.
  • Patience, empathy, and professionalism when handling complex cases.
  • Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, evolving remote environment.
  • Familiarity with crypto or blockchain is a plus.


What We Offer:

  • Remote-first work environment
  • Inclusive, collaborative team culture
  • 1 accrued PTO day per month worked
  • Independent contractor agreement


Ready to join us?

We’d love to hear from you—please submit your CV in English only for consideration.

title: Search Engine Optimization Specialist
description:
REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE


· SEO migrations - redirection mapping and implementation

· Knowledge of technical SEO components (canonicalization, XML sitemaps, keyword cannibalization, robots.txt, schema), investigating indexation and crawl errors , conducting site audits

· Familiarity and applied experience with tools such as Screaming Frog, Google Search Console, SEMRush (other SEO tools like Ahrefs or Moz) and Google Analytics

· Strong understanding of core SEO concepts such as crawlability, renderability, and indexability, links, keyword research and content

· Implement on-page optimizations to enhance page/content relevance, meta tags and content for improved search engine performance

· Understanding of front-end web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Schema Markup

· Identify strategic opportunities to grow organic traffic across the business

· Google Business profile optimization

· Experience in hyperlocal SEO, including location business listing management across online directories

· Experience doing technical SEO at scale

· Experience working with (and analyzing) large amounts of data

title: Senior Recruiter
description:
Regime: PJ | Full Remote | Tempo integral


Sobre a ReviewAll

Somos uma consultoria especializada em recrutamento e seleção para o ecossistema de startups e empresas de tecnologia. Atualmente, atendemos mais de 50 clientes, que vão desde early-stage, empresas seed-invested e startups Series A/B/C/D até grandes multinacionais.


Principais responsabilidades

  • Gerenciar de 10 a 14 processos seletivos simultâneos nas áreas de tecnologia, produto e negócios
  • Conduzir o recrutamento end-to-end:
  • Alinhamento de perfil diretamente com o cliente
  • Sourcing ativo (LinkedIn Recruiter, job boards, networking)
  • Triagem de currículos e entrevistas técnicas e comportamentais
  • Apresentação de shortlist e negociação de oferta
  • Acompanhamento de onboarding
  • Ser ponto único de contato para stakeholders (tech leads, PMs, diretores e founders), garantindo clareza de expectativas


Requisitos

  • Formação: não há preferência específica; caso esteja cursando ensino superior ou pós-graduação presencial, avalie a conciliação de horários
  • Experiência: sólida em executive search, conduzindo de 10 a 14 vagas simultâneas de nível sênior e gerencial, com foco na qualidade da entrega e evitando “impressoras de currículos”. Além disso ter ótimo conhecimento em vagas de tecnologia.
  • Idiomas: inglês fluente (fala e escrita); espanhol é diferencial


Perfil

  • Altamente organizado e orientado a resultados
  • Excelente comunicação interpessoal
  • Capacidade de gerenciar múltiplas prioridades em ritmo acelerado
  • Resiliência à pressão e postura hands-on


Infraestrutura

  • Computador próprio e conexão de internet estável


Pacote de remuneração

  • Fixo: R$ 3.000 – 4.000 (PJ)
  • Variável mensal: potencial médio de R$ 4.000 – 7.000, sem teto, conforme resultados individuais (em meses de alta performance, pode chegar em R$ 10.000)
  • Bônus trimestrais: até 4 salários por trimestre (total de até 16 anuais), de acordo com resultados individuais e da empresa

Temos como principal vocação a oferta de soluções terceirizadas, integradas através da tecnologia, dos processos e das pessoas. Com foco maior nos processos de desenvolvimento de software, nossa atuação abrange toda a estrutura de TI das empresas, incluindo Desenvolvimento de Sistemas, Governança, Segurança da Informação, Infraestrutura (TI e Telecom), Suporte Técnico e Operação.

Engenheiro de dados

  • Experiência em modelagem dimensional do tipo Star Schema;

  • Experiência em modelagem dimensional do tipo Star Schema;

title: Senior Analyst
description:
Senior Analyst – Energy Solutions

About Us:

For the past 12 years, CELA – Clean Energy Latin America has been providing financial and strategic advisory services to companies and investors in the renewable energy and energy transition sectors across Latin America. We are specialists in consultancy (strategic, market, and regulatory), capital raising, project finance, and M&A, in segments such as solar and wind energy, energy storage, and green hydrogen.

For more information, visit:


Position: Senior Analyst – Energy Solutions


Profile:

We are seeking a Senior Analyst/Consultant to work on energy transition projects at CELA. The candidate must be fluent in English and have prior experience in the power sector, with a background in areas such as self-production, regulation, or market intelligence. We are looking for a proactive professional, eager to develop in various topics within the energy sector and capable of working independently. We value professionals who are committed to the energy transition, skilled at building strategic relationships, and who contribute to the success of our dynamic consulting team.


Requirements:

·               Minimum of 5 years of experience in the energy sector;

·               Degree in Engineering, Business Administration, Economics, or related fields;

·               Proficiency in Excel and data analysis tools;

·               Advanced English – capable of leading meetings entirely in English, reading and writing technical materials with ease;


Key Responsibilities:

·               Demonstrate technical and regulatory knowledge in self-production, generation, energy trading (with a focus on large consumers), and distributed generation, as well as produce descriptive and analytical reports;

·               Assist clients in evaluating their consumption profiles and defining the most suitable energy procurement strategies;

·               Support consumers and generators in structuring and negotiating power purchase agreements (PPAs) in the free market, including models such as self-production by equivalence, leasing, consortium, among others;

·               Develop studies, reports, and dashboards on energy strategies and contract performance, providing insights for consumers and generators;

·               Stay updated on renewable energy market trends, new business models, and regulatory changes;

·               Provide support to other areas at CELA with expertise in regulation, energy products, auctions and trading.


Contract:

·               Independent contractor (“PJ”), with exclusive dedication to CELA.


Benefits:

·               Competitive compensation, negotiable based on the candidate’s experience;

·               Health and dental plan;

·               Paid vacation.


Work Model:

·               Primarily remote, with occasional in-person meetings required in São Paulo or other locations.


How to Aplly:

·               Please send your CV to Luísa at with the subject line:

“CV – Senior Analyst in Energy Solutions – CELA.”

·               Develop studies, reports, and dashboards on energy strategies and contract performance, providing insights for consumers and generators;

·               Stay updated on renewable energy market trends, new business models, and regulatory changes;

·               Provide support to other areas at CELA with expertise in regulation, energy products, auctions and trading.


Contract:

·               Independent contractor (“PJ”), with exclusive dedication to CELA.


Benefits:

·               Competitive compensation, negotiable based on the candidate’s experience;

·               Health and dental plan;

·               Paid vacation.


Work Model:

·               Primarily remote, with occasional in-person meetings required in São Paulo or other locations.


How to Aplly:

·               Please send your CV to Luísa at with the subject line:

“CV – Senior Analyst in Energy Solutions – CELA.”

title: Senior Analyst
description:
Senior Analyst – Energy Solutions

About Us:

For the past 12 years, CELA – Clean Energy Latin America has been providing financial and strategic advisory services to companies and investors in the renewable energy and energy transition sectors across Latin America. We are specialists in consultancy (strategic, market, and regulatory), capital raising, project finance, and M&A, in segments such as solar and wind energy, energy storage, and green hydrogen.

For more information, visit:


Position: Senior Analyst – Energy Solutions


Profile:

We are seeking a Senior Analyst/Consultant to work on energy transition projects at CELA. The candidate must be fluent in English and have prior experience in the power sector, with a background in areas such as self-production, regulation, or market intelligence. We are looking for a proactive professional, eager to develop in various topics within the energy sector and capable of working independently. We value professionals who are committed to the energy transition, skilled at building strategic relationships, and who contribute to the success of our dynamic consulting team.


Requirements:

·               Minimum of 5 years of experience in the energy sector;

·               Degree in Engineering, Business Administration, Economics, or related fields;

·               Proficiency in Excel and data analysis tools;

·               Advanced English – capable of leading meetings entirely in English, reading and writing technical materials with ease;


Key Responsibilities:

·               Demonstrate technical and regulatory knowledge in self-production, generation, energy trading (with a focus on large consumers), and distributed generation, as well as produce descriptive and analytical reports;

·               Assist clients in evaluating their consumption profiles and defining the most suitable energy procurement strategies;

·               Support consumers and generators in structuring and negotiating power purchase agreements (PPAs) in the free market, including models such as self-production by equivalence, leasing, consortium, among others;

·               Develop studies, reports, and dashboards on energy strategies and contract performance, providing insights for consumers and generators;

·               Stay updated on renewable energy market trends, new business models, and regulatory changes;

·               Provide support to other areas at CELA with expertise in regulation, energy products, auctions and trading.


Contract:

·               Independent contractor (“PJ”), with exclusive dedication to CELA.


Benefits:

·               Competitive compensation, negotiable based on the candidate’s experience;

·               Health and dental plan;

·               Paid vacation.


Work Model:

·               Primarily remote, with occasional in-person meetings required in São Paulo or other locations.


How to Aplly:

·               Please send your CV to Luísa at with the subject line:

title: Junior Software Developer (API Specialist)
description:
We’re looking for a Junior Software Developer (API Specialist) to join the team of one of our U.S.-based clients on a full-time basis. This professional will support the client’s growth efforts by customizing and integrating systems, with a primary focus on Zoho CRM.

It’s a great opportunity for someone with strong development fundamentals, hands-on API experience, and the ability to communicate fluently in English.

You’ll be responsible for enhancing CRM workflows, building integrations with third-party applications, and supporting internal tools that help drive business efficiency.


  • Key ResponsibilitiesCustomize and upgrade Zoho CRM to meet evolving business needs
  • Develop and maintain API integrations between Zoho and other tools/systems
  • Collaborate with team members to scope, develop, and test new features and automations
  • Troubleshoot and resolve system issues or integration bugs
  • Document processes, technical configurations, and code changes
  • Provide regular status updates and participate in team discussions


  • ✅ What We’re Looking For1–3 years of hands-on coding experience (any language or stack)
  • Proven experience working with APIs and system integrations
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Experience with Zoho CRM.
  • Ability to learn and adapt quickly to new tools and systems
  • Solid understanding of software development principles and basic project workflows
  • Fluent English communication skills (written and spoken) are required


  • Soft Skills & CommunicationExcellent communication skills: both written and verbal
  • Availability for timely status updates and team check-ins
  • Openness to giving and receiving feedback constructively
  • Comfortable voicing concerns or limitations proactively
  • Thick-skinned: resilient and able to handle constructive criticism with a growth mindset

title: Consultor de vendas
description:
A PORMADE PORTAS DE MADEIRAS DECORATIVAS, líder no mercado de fabricação e comercialização de portas de madeira, está em busca de um Consultor de Vendas para fazer parte do nosso time.


Há 21 anos, somos uma das melhores empresas para se trabalhar no Brasil e na América Latina, segundo o Great Place to Work, sendo eleita a melhor empresa para se trabalhar no Paraná..


Auxiliamos nossos mais de 1.300 colaboradores a alcançarem o seu potencial máximo, para tornar não só o ambiente de trabalho, mas a sociedade, em um lugar melhor para se viver!


Em constante crescimento e evolução, abrimos uma vaga para:

Consultor de Vendas (Franca, SP).


Você profissional que goste de interagir e trabalhar com a construção civil, que seja pró-ativo, possua habilidades com negociação e venda consultiva e tenha interesse em não apenas saber vender como também se preocupa com a experiência do cliente, esta oportunidade é para você!


REQUISITOS:

- Experiência prévia na área de construção civil será considerado um diferencial;

- Habilidades de comunicação e negociação;

- Habilidade com informática básica;

- Capacidade de identificar oportunidades de vendas e gerar mais negócios;

- Organização e senso de responsabilidade para gerenciar sua própria carteira de clientes;

- Capacidade de trabalhar bem em equipe e colaborar com outros departamentos.


PRINCIPAIS RESPONSABILIDADES:


- Prestar atendimento consultivo a campo para clientes e parceiros;

- Apresentação de nossos produtos e serviços;

- Vendas com base em visitas em obras;

- Gerenciamento de carteira, conferência de atividades do sistema (CRM);

- Contato e relacionamento com canais de prospecção com a finalidade de manutenção e um funil de vendas saudável.


ALGUNS BENEFÍCIOS E FACILIDADES PARA VOCÊ PODER NOS ACOMPANHAR NA JORNADA COM A GENTE

* Salário compatível com o mercado

* Variável por entrega

* Vale refeição

* Vale alimentação

* Plano de saúde

* Seguro de vida


Se você possui o perfil descrito acima e está em busca de um desafio profissional em uma empresa sólida que está em constante crescimento, candidate-se agora mesmo! Venha fazer parte dos Pormadeanos!

title: Desenvolvedor Unity
description:
Na Ambra, estamos à procura de um(a) Desenvolvedor(a) Unity apaixonado(a) e altamente qualificado(a) para se juntar ao nosso dinâmico time de tecnologia. Esta vaga representa uma oportunidade incrível para profissionais que buscam atuar em projetos desafiadores, utilizando a renomada plataforma Unity para criar jogos.


O(a) candidato(a) ideal para esta posição deverá possuir uma experiência robusta com programação em C# e desenvolvimento no ambiente Unity. Valorizamos profissionais que trazem consigo não apenas habilidade técnica, mas também um forte espírito criativo e uma capacidade excepcional de resolver problemas complexos. Além disso, é crucial que você seja capaz de colaborar eficazmente com equipes multidisciplinares para traduzir ideias inovadoras em experiências interativas que se destaquem no mercado.


Se você está pronto(a) para contribuir com sua expertise em um ambiente colaborativo e estimulante, a Ambra é o lugar para você. Esperamos ansiosamente por sua candidatura para dar início a uma jornada juntos, moldando o futuro dos jogos digitais.


Requisitos:

  • 5+ anos de experiência com desenvolvimento de jogos em Unity.
  • 5+ anos de experiência com C#.
  • Conhecimento de UI Toolkit e Addressables.
  • Experiência com ciclo de desenvolvimento ágil.
  • Ótima capacidade de se comunicar efetivamente e trabalhar em equipe.
  • Conhecimento e capacidade de aplicar de padrões de projeto e princípios de programação.
  • Capacidade supervisionar, orientar e revisar o trabalho de outros desenvolvedores.
  • Alto nível de responsabilidade em entregar código de qualidade no tempo estabelecido.
  • Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e se comunicar efetivamente.
  • Conhecimento de Git.

Diferenciais:

  • Ter participado do lançamento de jogos comercias.
  • Conhecimento de Python.
  • Conhecimento de C++.
  • Conhecimento de AWS.

  • Experiência com ciclo de desenvolvimento ágil.
  • Ótima capacidade de se comunicar efetivamente e trabalhar em equipe.
  • Conhecimento e capacidade de aplicar de padrões de projeto e princípios de programação.
  • Capacidade supervisionar, orientar e revisar o trabalho de outros desenvolvedores.
  • Alto nível de responsabilidade em entregar código de qualidade no tempo estabelecido.
  • Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e se comunicar efetivamente.
  • Conhecimento de Git.

Diferenciais:

  • Ter participado do lançamento de jogos comercias.
  • Conhecimento de Python.
  • Conhecimento de C++.
  • Conhecimento de AWS.

title: Desenvolvedor Unity
description:
Na Ambra, estamos à procura de um(a) Desenvolvedor(a) Unity apaixonado(a) e altamente qualificado(a) para se juntar ao nosso dinâmico time de tecnologia. Esta vaga representa uma oportunidade incrível para profissionais que buscam atuar em projetos desafiadores, utilizando a renomada plataforma Unity para criar jogos.


O(a) candidato(a) ideal para esta posição deverá possuir uma experiência robusta com programação em C# e desenvolvimento no ambiente Unity. Valorizamos profissionais que trazem consigo não apenas habilidade técnica, mas também um forte espírito criativo e uma capacidade excepcional de resolver problemas complexos. Além disso, é crucial que você seja capaz de colaborar eficazmente com equipes multidisciplinares para traduzir ideias inovadoras em experiências interativas que se destaquem no mercado.


Se você está pronto(a) para contribuir com sua expertise em um ambiente colaborativo e estimulante, a Ambra é o lugar para você. Esperamos ansiosamente por sua candidatura para dar início a uma jornada juntos, moldando o futuro dos jogos digitais.


Requisitos:

  • 5+ anos de experiência com desenvolvimento de jogos em Unity.
  • 5+ anos de experiência com C#.
  • Conhecimento de UI Toolkit e Addressables.

  • Alto nível de responsabilidade em entregar código de qualidade no tempo estabelecido.
  • Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e se comunicar efetivamente.

title: Senior Product Manager – Customer & Partner Portals
description:
Role Summary


We’re looking for a senior-level Product Manager with a strong technical foundation and deep familiarity with PRM (Partner Relationship Management) and/or customer‑support & CSM workflows. You’ll own the full product life‑cycle for our customer‑ and partner‑facing portals: gathering and prioritizing requirements, orchestrating sprints, driving adoption, and keeping churn low. The role is highly cross‑functional—part strategist, part project manager, part customer advocate.


Key Responsibilities


Product Strategy & Discovery

Conduct industry, ICP, and competitive research to identify market gaps and growth opportunities.

Translate insights into data‑driven product roadmaps that maximize user adoption and expansion revenue.

Requirements & Planning

Write clear, testable PRDs, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

Groom and prioritize backlogs, run sprint planning, and keep delivery on track in close partnership with Engineering and QA.

Customer & Stakeholder Engagement

Lead discovery calls, quarterly roadmap reviews, and beta programs with strategic customers and partners.

Serve as the escalation point for Support/CSM—triage bugs, clarify reproduction steps, and ensure timely resolution.

Execution & Delivery

Drive day‑to‑day scrum ceremonies and remove blockers.

Validate releases against requirements and customer expectations.

Go‑to‑Market & Enablement

Own release notes, in‑app guides, and knowledge‑base articles—working with Marketing and CS to ensure value messaging resonates with ICP personas.

Train Sales, Support, and Partner Managers on new capabilities.

Metrics & Continuous Improvement

Define and monitor KPIs such as feature adoption, NPS/CSAT, and churn/expansion rates.

Run post‑launch retrospectives and feed learnings into subsequent sprints.


Minimum Qualifications


  • 7+ years in Product Management for B2B SaaS, and business software development.
  • Experience with customer or partner portals, PRM, or support/CSM tooling is a plus.
  • Proven ability to author detailed PRDs , story maps, wireframes, and acceptance tests.
  • Hands‑on experience with Agile/Scrum (you can run a sprint like clockwork).
  • Technical background—CS degree or equivalent software‑engineering experience; comfortable discussing APIs, data models, and integration patterns.
  • Strong analytical skills: can size opportunities, model ROI, and prioritize ruthlessly.
  • Excellent communicator—equally at home talking to architects, C‑Suite execs, or frontline CSMs.
  • Demonstrated success boosting feature adoption and lowering churn through customer‑centric prioritization.


Preferred / Bonus


  • Direct experience with major PRM/CRM ecosystems (Salesforce, HubSpot, Magentrix, Impartner, etc.).
  • Familiarity with developer‑first documentation tooling (Storybook, Swagger/OpenAPI, Confluence, Git‑based workflows).
  • Exposure to product‑usage analytics platforms (Pendo, Amplitude) and voice‑of‑customer tools.
  • Background in channel operations, partner programs, or customer success leadership.


Success Indicators (First 12 Months)


  • Roadmap for the next three quarters finalized and signed off by the executive team.
  • ≥ 30 % uplift in portal feature adoption across top‑tier ICP accounts.
  • Mean time‑to‑resolution for critical portal bugs reduced by 25 %.
  • Release notes and documentation cadence standardized (100 % of releases accompanied by customer‑ready artifacts).


Reporting & Collaboration


  • Reports to : VP, Product & Strategy
  • Works closely with : Engineering, QA, UX/UI, Support, CSM, Sales Engineering, Marketing


Location & Working Hours


  • 100 % remote — work from anywhere with a dependable internet connection.
  • Minimum collaboration overlap of roughly 4 hours/day with North‑American EST time zone for stand‑ups, customer calls, and planning.


Ready to lead the evolution of customer and partner experience? Apply with a résumé that highlights your portal‑, PRM‑, or CSM‑related successes and showcases your knack for turning strategic insight into product reality.

title: Estagiário (Backoffice)
description:
*Na Terra Investimentos valorizamos a diversidade e inclusão. Por isso, encorajamos você a se candidatar, pois suas habilidades são importantes para nós.


Como é Ser Um(a) Estagiário (Backoffice):

Ser estagiário no backoffice é viver o dia a dia das operações de renda fixa, garantindo que cada etapa seja precisa, eficiente e com impacto direto nos bastidores do mercado financeiro.


Suas principais Responsabilidades:

  • Acompanhar o processo de liquidação financeira dos ativos. (título publico e debêntures)
  • Apoiar a geração de documentos para auditorias internas e externas.
  • Atualizar e manter relatórios da área, conforme necessário;
  • Auxiliar na conferência e no registro das operações de renda fixa.
  • Conciliação de posição.


O que esperamos de você:

  • Superior cursando em Engenharias, Economia, Estatística, Matemática e Administração;
  • Excel Intermediário;
  • Atenção aos detalhes e rigor na conferência de dados;
  • Interesse por entender como funciona o mercado financeiro e os bastidores da renda fixa;
  • Organização, boa comunicação e fluidez com outras áreas;
  • Postura ética e sigilosa são fundamentais.


O que será um diferencial:

  • Excel avançado;
  • Noções básicas de produtos de renda fixa e de mercado financeiro.
  • Conhecimento inicial sobre títulos públicos (ex.: Tesouro Direto), CDB, LCI/LCA, debêntures.
  • Buscamos alguém com vontade de aprender rápido e que encare desafios em um ambiente dinâmico como oportunidades de crescimento.


Qual será seu local de trabalho?

Local: Itaim Bibi, São Paulo/SP


Nossos Benefícios:

title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER SENIOR - REACT (REMOTO)
description:
LOCALIZA&CO

Estar em constante evolução nos trouxe até aqui. Ao lado de talentos e habilidades múltiplas nos conectamos em busca da nossa motivação: construir o futuro da mobilidade sustentável. É por meio da valorização da individualidade de cada um que impulsionamos o nosso movimento para conquistar resultados extraordinários, desenvolver nossas operações e criar soluções para os nossos clientes.

Somos apaixonados por nossa história, por nossas ideias e pela capacidade de realizá-las. Sabemos que juntos, todos vamos mais longe.

É assim que conectamos a Localiza&Co com o futuro.


Responsabilidades e atribuições

Buscamos um profissional para atuar no desenvolvimento de soluções web React e Next.JS. Atuará com um contexto desafiador e repleto de oportunidades, onde precisará desenvolver e manter soluções inovadoras, escaláveis e seguras.


Nossa stack é composta por aplicações modernas subdividas em micro serviços e microfrontends, além de algumas aplicações monolíticas legadas. Temos como objetivo, manter e modernizar essas aplicações dentro do atual direcionamento da arquitetura corporativa de referência.


Requisitos técnicos

  • Experiência sólida em desenvolvimento frontend utilizando React e Next.js;
  • Profundo conhecimento em Javascript, HTML/CSS;
  • Experiência na construção de remotes e hosts no contexto de microfrontends;
  • Experiência com frameworks de desenvolvimento ágil, como SCRUM e/ou Kanban;
  • Habilidade em resolver problemas complexos de desenvolvimento;
  • Docker;
  • Ferramentas de monitoramento, como Datadog;
  • SonarCloud;
  • Pipelines CI/CD.


BENEFÍCIOS DESSA POSIÇÃO

  • Participação nos Lucros
  • Carro Corporativo
  • Vale Alimentação
  • Vale Refeição
  • Convênio Médico
  • Convênio Odontológico
  • Gympass
  • Previdência Privada
  • Auxílio Home Office
  • Allya
  • Acesso ilimitado a diversos cursos da nossa Universidade Localiza
  • Programas internos de treinamento e desenvolvimento
  • Desconto em compra e aluguel de veículos

Nossa stack é composta por aplicações modernas subdividas em micro serviços e microfrontends, além de algumas aplicações monolíticas legadas. Temos como objetivo, manter e modernizar essas aplicações dentro do atual direcionamento da arquitetura corporativa de referência.


Requisitos técnicos

  • Experiência sólida em desenvolvimento frontend utilizando React e Next.js;
  • Profundo conhecimento em Javascript, HTML/CSS;
  • Experiência na construção de remotes e hosts no contexto de microfrontends;
  • Experiência com frameworks de desenvolvimento ágil, como SCRUM e/ou Kanban;
  • Habilidade em resolver problemas complexos de desenvolvimento;
  • Docker;
  • Ferramentas de monitoramento, como Datadog;
  • SonarCloud;
  • Pipelines CI/CD.

title: SAP MM DRC Consultant
description:
ob Summary:

We are seeking an experienced SAP MM DRC Consultant to join our team and support the implementation and optimization of SAP Document and Reporting Compliance (DRC) in the Materials Management (MM) domain. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP MM processes, with hands-on experience in the configuration and integration of SAP DRC to ensure regulatory compliance, particularly in the areas of e-invoicing, statutory reporting, and tax compliance.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, configure, and implement SAP DRC solutions in conjunction with MM (Materials Management) processes.
  • Ensure compliance with country-specific legal requirements for electronic invoicing and statutory reporting (e.g., SAF-T, XML, SII, CFDI, etc.).
  • Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements related to procurement and invoice processing.
  • Integrate SAP DRC with MM functionalities such as purchase orders, goods receipts, and invoice verification.
  • Participate in full project lifecycle activities including design, testing, training, cutover, and go-live support.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to DRC integration with MM, including document mapping, output management, and interface errors.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams including SAP FI, SD, and technical teams (ABAP/PI/CPI).
  • Support change management, user training, and documentation efforts related to DRC processes.
  • Keep abreast of SAP updates and legal changes impacting e-invoicing and reporting obligations.

Required Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of experience as an SAP MM Consultant , with at least 1–2 years working with SAP DRC or eDocument Framework .
  • Solid understanding of MM processes : procurement, invoice verification, goods movement, vendor master data.
  • Hands-on experience with SAP DRC configuration , including output determination, mapping, and eDocument cockpit.
  • Familiarity with local compliance regulations and tax reporting requirements in countries such as Spain, Hungary, Italy, Brazil, Mexico, etc.
  • Experience integrating SAP MM with SAP FI and Output Management (e.g., Adobe Forms, Smartforms).
  • Working knowledge of SAP S/4HANA is a strong plus.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

title: SAP PPDS
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Implementation and Configuration: Lead the implementation and configuration of SAP Production Planning (PP) and Demand Sensing (DS) modules within SAP S/4HANA to enhance production and planning processes.Analyze existing production and demand planning processes, identify gaps, and recommend best practices to optimize workflows and improve efficiency.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including supply chain, manufacturing, and IT, to ensure seamless integration of PP/DS with other modules and systems within SAP S/4HANA.Develop training materials and conduct training sessions for end-users to ensure effective adoption of the SAP PP/DS functionalities.
  • Provide ongoing support, troubleshooting, and issue resolution for SAP PP/DS applications, ensuring minimal disruption to production operations.
  • Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for system configurations, processes, and user guides.
  • Engage in project planning and execution, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and deliverables.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as an SAP PP/DS Consultant, specifically with hands-on experience in SAP S/4HANA implementations.Strong knowledge of SAP PP/DS functionalities, including demand planning, production scheduling, and integration with other SAP modules.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a strong analytical mindset to identify issues and propose effective solutions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, capable of effectively collaborating with various stakeholders and presenting complex information clearly.
  • Proficiency in English.

title: Search Engine Optimization Team Lead
description:
Lead SEO – Shape the Future of FinTech Growth


Position: Lead SEO

Employment Type: Full-Time

About RemitBee

Remitbee is a dynamic FinTech company based in Mississauga, ON, with a mission to "Spark the financial revolution by connecting people and money - across borders, currencies, and cultures." Our innovative platform enables customers to transfer money securely and affordably to over 100 countries. Additionally, we provide services like currency exchange, bill payments, gift cards, and more to simplify and enhance the financial experience.

Recognized as one of the GTA's most admired FinTech companies, Remitbee is expanding globally and acquiring additional market share in Canada. Join our vibrant, fast-growing team and make a significant impact on the way the world connects financially.

When you join our team, you’ll experience a culture of innovation, mentorship, and inclusion, where your ideas and skills will directly contribute to our vision of becoming the most trusted financial services provider globally.

Your Mission

As the Lead SEO, you’ll spearhead strategies that amplify RemitBee’s digital presence, driving both organic and paid growth. You’ll work with talented team, innovate cutting-edge campaigns, and ensure our online channels are optimized to their fullest potential.

What You’ll Do

- Craft Holistic Strategies: Develop integrated digital marketing plans encompassing SEO, SEM, SMM, and digital advertising to maximize visibility and engagement.

- Market Research & Trend Analysis: Conduct deep dives into market trends, competitor strategies, and opportunities to inform decision-making.

- Social Media Leadership: Create and execute campaigns that grow our community and foster meaningful engagement.

- Paid Advertising Management: Plan, execute, and refine paid campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Facebook, and LinkedIn, ensuring optimal ROI.

- Budget Optimization: Monitor, adjust, and manage ad budgets, targeting, and bidding strategies for continuous improvement.

- Graphic Design Integration: Collaborate on visually appealing content, enhancing campaigns with striking graphics and engaging digital materials.

- User Experience Focus: Oversee website design and optimization to align with brand aesthetics and deliver seamless user experiences.

- Reporting & Insights: Generate detailed performance reports, providing actionable insights to refine strategies.

What You Bring

- Proven Expertise: 5+ years of experience in SEO and digital marketing

- Educational Background: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

- Technical Proficiency: Mastery of SEO tools, web analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs), and advertising tools like Google Ads and Facebook Business Manager.

- Holistic Skillset: Expertise in SEO, SEM, SMM, digital advertising, and graphic design principles.

- Creative Vision: Strong eye for design and ability to align marketing visuals with strategic goals.

- Web Optimization Skills: Proficiency in web design principles and user experience optimization.

- Analytical Thinking: Ability to interpret data, identify trends, and apply insights to enhance performance.

- Leadership Excellence: Demonstrated success in leading teams and delivering impactful results.

- Adaptability: Passion for staying ahead of digital marketing trends and technologies to maintain a competitive edge.

What We Offer

- Competitive Compensation: Above-market salary and benefits.

- Inspiring Work Environment: Be part of a supportive and collaborative team that values your contributions.

- Professional Development: Opportunities for mentorship, growth, and leadership within a rapidly evolving industry.

- Global Impact: Join a company that’s redefining financial connections for individuals and businesses worldwide.

Apply Today!

Are you ready to take the lead in driving digital growth for a cutting-edge fintech platform? Join us at RemitBee, where your ideas and skills will shape the future of international remittances.

We encourage you to share this opportunity with your network or anyone you think might be a great fit. Additionally, feel free to reshare this post on your social media to help us reach more exceptional candidates like you.

To learn more about us, visit our website, check out our LinkedIn page, and follow us on Facebook for updates.

title: Search Engine Optimization Team Lead
description:
Lead SEO – Shape the Future of FinTech Growth


Position: Lead SEO

Employment Type: Full-Time

About RemitBee

Remitbee is a dynamic FinTech company based in Mississauga, ON, with a mission to "Spark the financial revolution by connecting people and money - across borders, currencies, and cultures." Our innovative platform enables customers to transfer money securely and affordably to over 100 countries. Additionally, we provide services like currency exchange, bill payments, gift cards, and more to simplify and enhance the financial experience.

Recognized as one of the GTA's most admired FinTech companies, Remitbee is expanding globally and acquiring additional market share in Canada. Join our vibrant, fast-growing team and make a significant impact on the way the world connects financially.

When you join our team, you’ll experience a culture of innovation, mentorship, and inclusion, where your ideas and skills will directly contribute to our vision of becoming the most trusted financial services provider globally.

Your Mission

As the Lead SEO, you’ll spearhead strategies that amplify RemitBee’s digital presence, driving both organic and paid growth. You’ll work with talented team, innovate cutting-edge campaigns, and ensure our online channels are optimized to their fullest potential.

What You’ll Do

- Craft Holistic Strategies: Develop integrated digital marketing plans encompassing SEO, SEM, SMM, and digital advertising to maximize visibility and engagement.

- Market Research & Trend Analysis: Conduct deep dives into market trends, competitor strategies, and opportunities to inform decision-making.

- Social Media Leadership: Create and execute campaigns that grow our community and foster meaningful engagement.

- Paid Advertising Management: Plan, execute, and refine paid campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Facebook, and LinkedIn, ensuring optimal ROI.

- Budget Optimization: Monitor, adjust, and manage ad budgets, targeting, and bidding strategies for continuous improvement.

- Graphic Design Integration: Collaborate on visually appealing content, enhancing campaigns with striking graphics and engaging digital materials.

- User Experience Focus: Oversee website design and optimization to align with brand aesthetics and deliver seamless user experiences.

- Reporting & Insights: Generate detailed performance reports, providing actionable insights to refine strategies.

What You Bring

- Proven Expertise: 5+ years of experience in SEO and digital marketing

- Educational Background: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

- Technical Proficiency: Mastery of SEO tools, web analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs), and advertising tools like Google Ads and Facebook Business Manager.

- Holistic Skillset: Expertise in SEO, SEM, SMM, digital advertising, and graphic design principles.

- Creative Vision: Strong eye for design and ability to align marketing visuals with strategic goals.

- Web Optimization Skills: Proficiency in web design principles and user experience optimization.

- Analytical Thinking: Ability to interpret data, identify trends, and apply insights to enhance performance.

- Leadership Excellence: Demonstrated success in leading teams and delivering impactful results.

- Adaptability: Passion for staying ahead of digital marketing trends and technologies to maintain a competitive edge.

What We Offer

- Competitive Compensation: Above-market salary and benefits.

- Inspiring Work Environment: Be part of a supportive and collaborative team that values your contributions.

- Professional Development: Opportunities for mentorship, growth, and leadership within a rapidly evolving industry.

- Global Impact: Join a company that’s redefining financial connections for individuals and businesses worldwide.
